version_description:
We would like to thank our users that sent us emails about suggestions and bugs they are facing.

In this update we were finally able to remove the tab view that was blocking the player when using Direct stream feature.
We added a way to support bigger playlists.
Option to remove ads and smooth channels sync and much more.

If you have any questions do not hesitate to contact us at
contact@mobime.org

We would like to thank our users that sent us emails about suggestions and bugs they are facing.

In this update we were finally able to remove the tab view that was blocking the player when using Direct stream feature.
We added a way to support bigger playlists.
Option to remove ads and smooth channels sync and much more.

If you have any questions do not hesitate to contact us at
contact@mobime.org

Dear users,
we apologise that it took us a while to fix some of the issues.

In this update we fixed the restore purchase problem some of our users reported.
Another wished feature mentioned by one of our long time users the ability to search inside playlists.
Finally you are able to search your lists, locally and remotely no matter how big your playlists are.

We could never bring our app to such value without your support and recommendation so please let us know if any feature you wish having using the contact option or write us directly at contact@mobime.org

Thank you everyone.
